pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, February 12, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, February 12, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Gatineau, Quebec

8 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Black History Month reception and deliver remarks.

Canadian Museum of History
100 Laurier Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:45 pm and present themselves to registration
  • Program to begin at 7:20 pm
  • The event will be live streamed here: https://www.facebook.com/CdnHeritage/
